emails.subject: Board Meeting to discuss Half a Camel Involvement in Brighton Fringe 2025
emails.body_summary: Brighton Fringe informs Ben that trustees are considering whether Half a Camel should remain a partner; lists alleged failures and invites representations by 13 July 2025.

sar_assessment.reason: Outgoing notice of alleged breaches. Does not request access to Ben Carter's personal data.

emails.subject: Re: Board Meeting to discuss Half a Camel Involvement in Brighton Fringe 2025
emails.body_summary: Ben asks whether matters were reported to authorities and requests the specific evidence underlying the allegations to allow a meaningful response.

scope: All personal data about Ben Carter contained in 'conversations and emails from artists' and internal communications relied upon by the board
Any records citing Ben Carter personally in relation to alleged GDPR breaches, contractual matters, or conduct
Processing particulars: purposes, categories, recipients, sources, retention where applicable
sar_assessment.notes: A SAR can be informal; request for the specific evidence about Ben qualifies as a request for his personal data (opinions and allegations about a person are personal data). Data solely about the company may fall outside scope unless it identifies Ben personally.

emails.subject: Re: Board Meeting to discuss Half a Camel Involvement in Brighton Fringe 2025
emails.body_summary: Fringe replies in-line: not reporting to regulators; frames issues as contract; lists categories of evidence (artist conversations/emails incl. data sharing consent concerns, Free Ticketed decisions, filming promises, venue hire charges).

sar_assessment.reason: Provides descriptions of categories but not copies/access to Ben's personal data. Must provide his personal data with third-party redactions or a meaningful extract within one month.

emails.subject: Re: Board Meeting to discuss Half a Camel Involvement in Brighton Fringe 2025
emails.body_summary: Short closing line ('I’m not to read it Duncan, you do what you like x').

ico_guidance.point: A SAR can be made verbally or in writing; no set words needed.
One-month to respond; extension up to two further months if complex, with reasons.
Opinions and allegations about a person are that person’s personal data; third-party data may be redacted.
ico_guidance.citation: ICO — What is personal data / Third-party information

timeline.notes: Fringe listed categories but did not disclose copies/extracts of Ben Carter’s personal data. Follow-up notice and ICO-ready summary required.
